sentences.en: A usually impermeable substance used for caulking.
sentences.cn: 堵塞材料用于堵缝的通常不渗透的材料.

sentences.en: Cancer is a cellular structure whose cell wall has become impermeable.
sentences.cn: 癌症就是细胞壁变得难以渗透的细胞结构.

sentences.en: Fluid pressure , flux, leaky and impermeable boundary conditions may be prescribed.
sentences.cn: 可指定流体压力 、 涌出量 、 泄漏量和非渗透边界条件.

sentences.en: He surrounded himself with an impermeable wall of secretaries, personal assistants and yes - men.
sentences.cn: 他把自己用由秘书 、 私人助理和 唯唯诺诺 的人组成的密不透风的墙包围起来.

sentences.en: In the design of the impermeable curtain grouting engineering, high - pressure cement grouting with orifice - closed adopted.
sentences.cn: 某水电站二期工程为地下厂房, 工程防渗帷幕灌浆采用了孔口封闭法高压水泥灌浆.

sentences.en: No paint is impermeable to water vapour.
sentences.cn: 没有哪种涂料是不透水汽的。

sentences.en: The accumulation of oilis governed by lateral changes from permeable to impermeable facies.
sentences.cn: 石油的储集是受从渗透到不渗透的岩相横向变化控制的.

sentences.en: The canoe is made from an impermeable wood.
sentences.cn: 独木舟由防水木头制成。

sentences.en: The external layer of the skin is relatively impermeable to water.
The impermeable layer has aged, we must find someone to repair it.
sentences.cn: 楼顶的防渗层已经老化, 要请人来修理了.

sentences.en: The nature AMPA receptor is normally Ca ~ ( 2 + ) impermeable due to the expression of GluR 2 subunit.
sentences.cn: 由于GluR2亚单位的表达天然AMPA受体通道对 Ca2 +不通透.

sentences.en: The objects are covered with impermeable decorative coatings of glass like material.
sentences.cn: 这些物体上覆盖着玻璃状不透水的装饰涂层.

sentences.en: Thus clays and shales tend to be impermeable.
sentences.cn: 因此粘土和页岩就往往不透水.

sentences.en: Water cannot easily flow in these impermeable rocks.
sentences.cn: 水不容易流进那些不透水的岩石.

sentences.en: What is cancer? Cancer is a cellular structure whose cell wall has become impermeable.
sentences.cn: 癌症是什么? 癌症是细胞壁变得难以渗透的细胞结构.

words.tran_cn: 不渗透性；不透过性；不能渗透的性质或状态

phrases.tran_cn: 不透水层；不透水煤柱；不渗透边界

trans.tran_en: not allowing liquids or gases to pass through
